original: ras_/@#/_/dam tshhig sbas pa/
analyzed: tshhig sbed

original: tshhig srungs dgos pas dam tshhig bstan/_dam tshhig sbas pa/_rje btshun ma sgrol ma la phyag
analyzed: tshhig srungs dgos ba dam tshhig tshhig sbed btshun ma sgrol ma la phyag

original: 'tshhal lo/_/dam tshhig mdor bstan pa sgrub thabs bcu gsum gyi sgo nas rgyas par bshad pa rang gi chos nyid
analyzed: tshhal tshhig mdor ston ba sgrub thabs chu gsum gyi sgo nas rgya ba chad ba rang gi chos nyid

original: dam tshhig nyams pas dkyil 'khor du/_/dbang bskur gyi dam tshhig srungs na dngos grub
analyzed: dam tshhig nyams ba dkyil khor skur gyi dam tshhig srungs na dngos grub

original: thob par mi 'gyur/_/de bas shes rab dang ldan pa yin rnal 'byor blo ldan pas/_/dam
analyzed: thob ba mi ba shes rab dang ldan ba yin rnal byor blo ldan

original: tshhig skyon yon shes par byas pa'o/_/rtag tu skyang bar bya/_/byang chub yi dam lha dang sems kyi rdo rje dang /_/bla ma rdo rje spyan ras gzigs snying skur gcig pa'i rgyud bzhin no/_/'dzin pa

original: yang /_/tha dad par ni mthong na nyams par 'gyur ma mthong ba/_/de ni lte bar ster ma 'dra ba'o/_/
analyzed: yang dad ba ni mthong na nyams ba gyur ma mthong ni lte ba ster ma dra

original: dam tshhig bgrang ba'i dang po yin/_/thos pa'i rtsha bzang rtsha lung nas skad 'don pa byas pa'i spun
analyzed: dam tshhig bgrong ba dang po ba rtsha bzang rtsha lung nas skad don ba byed ba spun

original: dang dbang gi lhan gcig tu bkur ba'i spun/_/rtsha bza' ba rdo rje'i bum pa man ngag lus pa'i spun
analyzed: dang dbang gi lhan gcig tu bkur ba bza ba rdo rje bum ba man ngag lus ba spun

original: dang mi mdzad pa'o sgrub pa'i spun lhan gcig du byas pa'i/_/lhan gcig du thob pa'i dam tshhig spun dang

analyzed: lnga po tu khro bo btshon ba byed ba lus brtegs ba zab mo don ston ba byed

analyzed: dam tshhig gnyis ba rjod ba bru dang ni gang zag dang

original: don dang rnam par shes lnga mngon dang ldan pa/_/de la mi bden rdzun zer ba yid bstan mi byed

original: pa/_/de ni bde gshegs bka' las 'da' ba'i dam tshhig gsum pa yin/_/ri mo can dang dung can ma/_/dpral ba na pad+ma'i ru ba yod pa pad ma can dang glang po can/_/phur bu

analyzed: sogs ba mi la sogs ba sha yi rnam ba gsol rtogs ba med ba la dngos grub tu shes
